short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the capital letter X to twitter on x.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This nifty little extension will change any mention of "X" on twitter to well... twitter. some people might like this, and well, i try to please the people xd
